Text:
This has to be fake; I have HeroMasters ISO version, and when I saw this upload, I used 7zip on Ultra setting to compress it  just to see if this is legit, but the output size is larger than this at 18%:

http://bayimg.com/gAiMCaAEk

So.............FAKE!! unless videos & audio are ripped, which uploader claims nothing is ripped.

I hadn't very much faith in it, but it works great! 
decompresses at 6.7 Gb and already completed the 2 new modes without any problem
Thanks!!!
